description: InfluxDB based dashboard for processor telemetry (telegraf)

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") AS "value" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("free") AS "value" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("uptime") AS "value" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("total")  / (1024*1024*1024) FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("available_percent") AS "value" FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("packets_loss") FROM "pchc_ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "dst_host", "dst_ip"
SELECT mean("packets_loss") FROM "pchc_ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "dst_host", "dst_ip"
SELECT mean("time_avg") as time_avg FROM "pchc_ping" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "dst_host", "dst_ip"
SELECT mean("time_mdev") as time_mdev FROM "pchc_ping" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "dst_host", "dst_ip"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_in), 1s) * 8 as "in"
FROM "ipsec"
WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)
ORDER BY asc

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_out), 1s) * 8 as "out"
FROM "ipsec"
WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)
ORDER BY asc

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_in), 1s) as "in"
FROM "ipsec"
WHERE
  host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)
ORDER BY asc

SELECT 
  non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_out), 1s) as "out"
FROM "ipsec"
WHERE
  host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)
ORDER BY asc

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv), 1s) * 8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|ens|eth|bond|tun|gre|ovs|ib-).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent), 1s) * 8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|ens|eth|bond|tun|gre|ovs|ib-).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|ens|eth|bond|tun|gre|ovs|ib-).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|ens|eth|bond|tun|gre|ovs|ib-).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|ens|eth|bond|tun|gre|ovs|ib-).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host,interface fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|ens|eth|bond|tun|gre|ovs|ib-).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host,interface fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|ens|eth|bond|tun|gre|ovs|ib-).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host,interface fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|ens|eth|bond|tun|gre|ovs|ib-).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

SELECT mean(usage_idle) as "idle", mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(inodes_free) as "free", mean(inodes_used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "path"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads), 1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes), 1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes), 1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes), 1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time), 1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time), 1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *
SELECT mean(free) as "free", mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("in") as "in", mean("out") as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(used_percent) as used FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host ORDER BY asc

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

title: Processor Telemetry
